Comments.Message:
Hi,

It would be helpful to know which technique your are currently using to deploy your application. In case you are using ClickOnce which is the recommend approach, I believe you could check the following MSDN article where common issues when using ClickOnce Deployments are described:

Server and Client Configuration Issues in ClickOnce Deployments http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/ms228998.aspx

On the other hand, based on my understanding Prism XBAP application requires full trust to execute under IIS, perhaps this could be related to your problem. For more information regarding this subject I believe you could check the following related resources:

Can I develop XBAP application with this framework?http://compositewpf.codeplex.com/discussions/31058

XBAP - Deploying to CompositeWPF to IIS Server http://www.global-webnet.net/BlogEngine/post/2008/07/30/XBAP-Deploying-to-IIS-Server-with-Full-Trust.aspx

I hope this helps,

Agustin Adamihttp://blogs.southworks.net/aadamiï»¿
